body_html:
@av8ramit Thanks! It seems it's all good now! :)

@asimshankar Thanks for helping with this! If indeed you migrate those jobs away, do you plan to provide a way to obtain nightly builds for the dynamic libraries (i.e., libtensorflow.so and libtensorflow_framework.so)?
body_text:
@av8ramit Thanks! It seems it's all good now! :)
@asimshankar Thanks for helping with this! If indeed you migrate those jobs away, do you plan to provide a way to obtain nightly builds for the dynamic libraries (i.e., libtensorflow.so and libtensorflow_framework.so)?
body:
@av8ramit Thanks! It seems it's all good now! :)

@asimshankar Thanks for helping with this! If indeed you migrate those jobs away, do you plan to provide a way to obtain nightly builds for the dynamic libraries (i.e., `libtensorflow.so` and `libtensorflow_framework.so`)?
